firstSection.title: CO2 emissions overview for the year

transports.title: Transport emissions
transports.description: Information on CO2 emissions in transportation helps organizations monitor, analyze, and progress toward sustainability goals, focusing on reducing greenhouse gases.

withinTheBorder.title: Within the border
withinTheBorder.infoTooltip: Relates to emissions collected by trips that started and ended in the city itself.

outOfTheBorder.title: Outside the border
outOfTheBorder.infoTooltip: Relates to emissions collected by trips that at some point in the trip passed through the city. That is, that vehicle at some point emitted carbon in the city, but his trip did not end in the city itself

CO2InboundAndOutbound.title: Comparison of emissions within and outside geographic boundaries
CO2InboundAndOutbound.description: Compares the average CO2 emissions per kilometer between different types of transport, differentiating emissions within and outside geographic boundaries.

Co2EmissionPerTransport.title: Comparison of emissions by type of transport
Co2EmissionPerTransport.description: Compares CO2 emissions divided by specific types of transport, providing insight into the efficiency of each mode over the years.

Co2EmissionPerKilometer.title: Comparison of emissions per kilometer and type of transport
Co2EmissionPerKilometer.description: Compares CO2 emissions per kilometer between different types of transport, highlighting the variations between modes.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Changes made here will be saved only on this device.
